column1: # Legend: POR = default value; R/W = read/write; R = read-only; INT = interrupt; YM = the interrupt can be masked

column6: Description

Returns the input source D+/D- detection result. 0000: Not started (500mA) 0001: USB SDP (500mA) 0010: USB DCP (2A) 0011: USB CDP (1.5A) 0100: Divider 1 (1A) 0101: Divider 2 (2.1A) 0110: Divider 3 (2.4A) 0111: Divider 4 (2A) 1000: Unknown (500mA) 1001: High-voltage adapter (2A) 1110: Divider 5 (3A)
Reserved.
Reserved.
0: Not in VINDPM 1: In VINDPM
0: Not in IINDPM 1: In IINDPM
Reserved.
When VVIN_UV < VIN < VVIN_OV in buck mode this bit is set to 1 and the PG pin is driven low (after a 15ms debounce time). 0: The input source is not valid 1: The input source is good
Indicates whether input source type detection has finished. IIN_LIM[4:0] is updated. 0: VIN is not ready to charge 1: VIN is ready to charge
0: Normal 1: Legacy cable is detected (not valid in DRP mode)
0: Not in thermal regulation 1: In thermal regulation
0: VBATT < VSYS_MIN 1: VBATT > VSYS_MIN
0: Normal 1: The watchdog timer has expired
0: Normal 1: The 3/4 watchdog timer has expired
000: Not charging 001: Trickle charge 010: Pre-charge 011: Fast charge 100: Constant-voltage charge 101: Charging is done

000: Normal 001: An IN overload or short (latch-off) has occurred 010: Boost over-voltage protection (OVP) (not latch) has occurred 011: Boost over-temperature protection (latch-off) has occurred 100: The boost has stopped due to BATT_LOW (latch-off)
00: Normal 01: Input OVP 10: The charge timer has expired 11: Battery OVP
0: Normal 1: NTC is missing (VNTC > 95% of VVRNTC)
0: Normal 1: The battery is missing (2 terminations detected within 3 seconds)
000: Normal 001: Warm 010: Cool 011: Cold 100: Hot
000: Normal 001: Warm 010: Cool 011: Cold 100: Hot
00: CC1 detects vRa 01: CC1 detects vRd-USB 10: CC1 detects vRd-1.5 11: CC1 detects vRd-3.0. A glitch in tPD_DEBOUNCE does not affect this result.
00: CC2 detects vRa 01: CC2 detects vRd-USB 10: CC2 detects vRd-1.5 11: CC2 detects vRd-3.0. A glitch in tPD_DEBOUNCE does not affect this result.
00: CC1 is vOPEN 01: CC1 detects vRd 10: CC1 detects vRa. A glitch in tPD_DEBOUNCE does not affect this result.
00: CC2 is vOPEN 01: CC2 detects vRd 10: CC2 detects vRa. A glitch in tPD_DEBOUNCE does not affect this result.
Reserved.
0: The top-off timer is not counting 1: The top-off timer is counting
0: The battery is charging or disabled 1: The battery is discharging
The hysteresis = 200mV. 0: VBATT is greater than BATT_LOW[1:0] 1: VBATT is below BATT_LOW[1:0]
If the boost needs to be turned on/off by CC detection this bit is set/reset with an INT pulse followed. 0: Boost should be disabled 1: Boost should be enabled
0: VIN is below the VIN_TEST threshold 1: VIN has reached the VIN_TEST threshold
0: Normal 1: Enters DebugAccessory.SNK state
0: Normal 1: Enters AudioAccessory state
